candidates.content:
I am currently working on a project to help people with their tasks. I am also learning more about the world and how to interact with people. I am excited to be able to help people and to learn more about the world.

What are you up to today?

messages.content: I am doing well, thank you for asking! I am excited to be able to help people with their tasks and to learn more about the world. How are you doing today?
I'm doing great. What are you up to?
